Ironjawz (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Destruction - Orruk Warclans) [2,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [790pts]

      • Megaboss on Maw-krusha [460pts]

        Selections: 0. Checked Out, 3. Mean 'Un, 5. Metalrippa's Klaw, Boss Gore-hacka and Choppa, General

        Categories: Leader, IRONJAWZ, DESTRUCTION, Behemoth, HERO, Orruk, MAW-KRUSHA, MEGABOSS, General, Artefact

        Rules: Megaboss on Maw-krusha

        Artefact: Metalrippa's Klaw, Command Abilities: Go on Ladz, Get Stuck In!, Command Trait: Checked Out, Mean 'Un, Maw-Krusha: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Unit: Megaboss on Maw-krusha, Unit Abilities: Destructive Bulk, Fly, Strength from Victory, Weapon: Boss Gore-hacka, Innard-bursting Bellow, Mighty Fists and Tail


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Metalrippa's Klaw Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. Change the Rend characteristic of that weapon to -3 before applying any other modifiers to that weapon’s Rend characteristic.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Go on Ladz, Get Stuck In! You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability, or wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability that is a MONSTER. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Checked Out Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly CHOPPAS units while they are wholly within 18" of this general
        Mean 'Un Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this model's Mighty Fists and Tail
        Maw-Krusha MoveMighty FistsDestructive Bulk
        00-03 12"88 dice
        04-06 10"77 dice
        07-09 8"66 dice
        10-12 6"55 dice
        13+ 4"44 dice
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Megaboss on Maw-krusha *1583+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Destructive Bulk After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the Destructive Bulk value on this model’s damage table. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

        If the mortal wounds inflicted by this model’s Destructive Bulk mean there are no enemy models left within 3" of it, then it can attempt to make another charge move, and it can make another Destructive Bulk attack after that move if the charge is successfully carried out. This model can attempt to make any number of charge moves in a single turn, so long as each one results in all enemy models within 3" being slain.
        Fly A Maw-krusha can fly.
        Strength from Victory At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, add 1 to this model’s Wounds characteristic and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Boss Choppa and Rip-toof Fist or this model’s Boss Gore-hacka and Choppa.

        Mighty Fists and Tail Melee1"*3+3+-22

      • Orruk Warchanter [110pts]

        Selections: 1. Get 'Em Beat

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, Orruk, IRONJAWZ, HERO, TOTEM, Leader

        Prayer: Get 'Em Beat, Unit: Orruk Warchanter, Unit Abilities: Rhythm of Destruction, Violent Fury, Weapon: Gorkstikk and Morkstikk


        Prayer Description
        Get 'Em Beat At the start of your charge phase, 1 model that knows this warbeat can use it. If they do so, roll a dice. On a 4+, pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of this WARCHANTER. In that phase, you can attempt to charge with that unit if it is within 18" of the enemy instead of 12". Roll 3D6 instead of 2D6 when making the charge roll for that unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Orruk Warchanter 4"674+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Rhythm of Destruction If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Gorkstikk and Morkstikk is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Violent Fury In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 15" of this model. Until your next hero phase, add 1 to the damage inflicted by attacks made with melee weapons by that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase.

      • Orruk Weirdnob Shaman [110pts]

        Selections: 1. Great Green Visions, 6. Wrath of Gork

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, Orruk, IRONJAWZ, HERO, WIZARD, Leader, Weirdnob Shaman, Artefact

        Artefact: Great Green Visions, Magic: Orruk Weirdnob Shaman, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Green Puke, Mystic Shield, Wrath of Gork, Unit: Orruk Weirdnob Shaman, Unit Abilities: Brutal Power, Power of the Waaagh!, Weapon: Waaagh! Staff


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Great Green Visions At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 4+, you receive 1 command point.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Orruk Weirdnob Shaman 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Green Puke
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Green Puke 8Green Puke has a casting value of 8. Draw a straight line 2D6" long from the mouth of the Shaman. Each enemy unit crossed by the line suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Wrath of Gork 8If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the caster and visible to them, and then roll 2 dice for each friendly IRONJAWZ unit with 2 or more models that is wholly within 16" of the caster. For each 2+, you can inflict 1 mortal wound on that enemy unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Orruk Weirdnob Shaman 4"665+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Brutal Power If this model is wholly within 18" of a friendly IRONJAWZ unit with 10 or more models at the end of its hero phase, it can attempt to cast the Green Puke spell in addition to any other spells it can cast, and even if a WIZARD has already attempted to cast the Green Puke spell in that hero phase.
        Power of the Waaagh! Add 1 to a Weirdnob Shaman's casting or unbinding rolls if there are 10 or more ORRUK models within 10". Add 2 to the roll instead if there are 20 or more ORRUK models within 10". However, if the casting or unbinding roll was a double, then the closest other friendly Orruk unit within 10" of the Weirdnob Shaman suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Waaagh! Staff Melee1"34+3+-1D3

          Selections: 2x 3 Gore-Gruntas [320pts], Jagged Gore-hacka

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, Orruk, IRONJAWZ, Other, Battleline

          Rules: Gore-Grunta Boss, Orruk Gore-Gruntas

          Unit: Orruk Gore-Gruntas, Unit Abilities: Gore-Grunta Boss, Gore-Grunta Charge, Weapon: Jagged Gore-hacka, Tusks and Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Orruk Ardboys 4"264+
        Orruk Brutes 4"364+
        Orruk Gore-Gruntas 9"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Ardboy Boss 1 model in this unit can be an Ardboy Boss. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Ardboy Choppas.
        Duff Up da Big Fing Add 1 to the hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target a unit with a Wounds characteristic of 4+
        Gore-Grunta Boss 1 model in this unit can be a Gore-grunta Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Pig-iron Choppa or Jagged Gore-hacka.
        Gore-Grunta Charge Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of a model from this unit after the model from this unit finishes a charge move. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If this unit has more than 1 model, roll to determine if mortal wounds are inflicted after each model completes its charge move, but do not allocate the mortal wounds until after all of the models in the unit have moved.

        In addition, add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made with this unit’s Jagged Gore-hackas and Tusks and Hooves if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.
        Gorkamorka Banner Bearer Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Gorkamorka Banner Bearers
        Gorkamorka Glyph Bearer Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 3" of any friendly Gorkamorka Glyph Bearers.
        Ironfist Big Boss Pick 1 Brute Boss or Gore-grunta Boss from a unit in this battalion to be the battalion’s Big Boss. Add 2 to that model’s Wounds characteristic.
        Orruk-forged Shields Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound to a model carrying an Orruk-forged Shield. On a 6, that wound is negated.
        Up and At 'Em Once in each of your hero phases, the Big Boss from this battalion can use the Mighty Destroyers command ability (pg 55) without spending 1 command point
        Waaagh! Drummer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Waaagh! Drummer. Add 2 to charge rolls for a unit while it includes any Waaagh! Drummers.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Ironjawz

          Selections: Da Choppas

          Battle Trait: Eager for Battle, Mad As Hell, Smashing and Bashing, Vandal Hordes, Command Abilities: Da Choppas, Ironjawz Waaagh!, Mighty Destroyer


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Eager for Battle Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly IRONJAWZ units.
        Mad As Hell At the end of any phase, if any wounds or mortal wounds have been inflicted in that phase on an IRONJAWZ unit thatis more than 9" from any enemy units, that IRONJAWZ unit can move D6".
        Smashing and Bashing In the combat phase, after a friendly IRONJAWZ unit has fought, if the attacks made by that unit resulted in any enemy units being destroyed, you can pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit that has not yet fought in that combat phase and that is within 3" of an enemy unit. That unit fights immediately, before the opposing player picks a unit to fight in that combat phase. That unit cannot fight again in that combat phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.
        Vandal Hordes You can re-roll charge rolls for CHOPPAS units that are within 12" of a terrain feature that is fully or partially in enemy territory.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Da Choppas You can use this command ability when you use a friendly CHOPPAS WARCHANTER’S Violent Fury ability. If you do so, you can pick up to 3 different friendly CHOPPAS BRUTES units and/or CHOPPAS ARDBOYS units to be affected by the ability instead of 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit
        Ironjawz Waaagh! You can use this command ability once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, if you have an Ironjawz army and your general is a MEGABOSS and on the battlefield. If you do so, roll a dice and add the number of friendly IRONJAWZ units wholly within 18" of your general to the roll.

        If the roll is up to 11, until the end of that phase add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly IRONJAWZ units wholly within 18" of your general.

        If the roll is 12 or more, until the end of that phase add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly IRONJAWZ units wholly within 18" of your general.
        Mighty Destroyer You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of a friendly IRONJAWZ HERO or wholly within 18" of a friendly IRONJAWZ HERO that is a general. That unit must make a normal move if it is more than 12" from any enemy units, must fight if it is within 3" of any enemy units, and must attempt to charge in any other circumstances. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6.

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll.

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase.

Selection Rules

Gore-Grunta Boss: The leader of each unit is a Gore-grunta Boss. They make 4 attacks rather than 3.

Megaboss on Maw-krusha: A Megaboss on Maw-krusha is a single model. The Megaboss rides on the Maw-krusha's backand is armed with a Boss Gore-hacka and a Scrap-toof or a Choppa and a Rip-toof Fist. The Maw-krusha can batter opponents with its Mighty Fists, flatten them with its Destructive Bulk, or smash them with its Bladed Tail, while its Innard-bursting Bellow can kill foes from afar.

Orruk Gore-Gruntas: A unit of Orruk Gore-Gruntas has 3 or more models. The riders of some units of Gore-Gruntas are armed with Pig-iron Choppas, while others carry Jagged Gore-hackas. Their mounts tear at the enemy with their Fanged Maws and Hooves.
